articles.author: C_Hong
articles.title: 2021 Mnet Asian Music Awards Rolls Out The Red Carpet For Stars - soompi
articles.description: Stars of all stripes—singers, actors, dancers, and more—lit up the red carpet at the 2021 Mnet Asian Music Awards (2021 MAMA)! Hosted by Lee Hyori, 2021 MAMA kicked off on December 11 at 6 p.m. KST at CJ ENM’s Contents World in Paju City in Gyeonggi Province.…

articles.author: Tuba Waqar
articles.title: Where to watch MAMA 2021: Live streaming details, start time, lineup and all you need to know - Sportskeeda
articles.description: One of the most eagerly anticipated events in the South Korean entertainment industry, Mnet Asian Music Awards 2021 (MAMA 2021), is all set to take place on December 11, 2021.
articles.content:

articles.title: Myanmar anti-coup activists protest against junta with 'silent strike' - Reuters
articles.description: Protesters in Myanmar closed businesses and stayed off the streets on Friday in a "silent strike" against rule by the military and its ousting of the Southeast Asian country's democratically elected government in a February coup.
